EmailTemplate.name: ICH Case Confirmation - online HTML
EmailTemplate.subject: Case {!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Thank you for your interest to join the IATA Settlement Systems. One of our Participation team members will respond to you shortly.
You have been allocated the following: Case number: # {!Case.CaseNumber} Case description: {!Case.Description}
Please quote this case number as a reference if you wish to contact us regarding your enquiry.
Best regards,
IATA Participation Team Global Delivery Center
